posts.author: Thorsson
posts.content:
Mages, there's not much you can do about.

So the question is what can you do about high damage critters? I presume you are looking at Str-based WMs here - do you have any idea of their AB (and AC)? If the AB was the same as yours the first attack has a 75% hit chance, then it would be 50%, 25% and the rest at 5%, although they would get another 75% attack with Haste. Depending on the weapon they will crit a fair bit with those numbers. Any AC you can get is going to help, but you really want a fair bit more. 5 more AC would reduce the crits by about half. BTW does that AC include Bard Song (or the effects of Curse Song, reducing their AB).
